title: Financial Planning

content: I am a CPA and financial planner. I work as a fiduciary for all of my clients to help them minimize taxes and reach their financial goals. I specialize in tax preparation and financial planning for real estate investors, the self-employed, and anyone looking to reach financial independence.
summary: I am a CPA and financial planner.
title: How I Serve My Clients

content: My investing philosophy is simple: #Invest as much as possible, diversify those investments, and Save money by taking adavantage of low cost, tax smart investments.
